plot outline: Vishnu Khot a village head has controlled the village for years for his benefits he has killed many people he daily goes to spend night with Nanda a courtesan along with his illegitimate son Raghu who waits to guard him.On his way to house of Nanda ,Vishnu always years screams of Raghu's mother but Raghu cant here the same and feels it to be the ghost of his mother whom Vishnu had killed.The village get a message that British Officer Rand will be arriving soon and they have to be ready fro the same to please him.Nanda finds that her lover Bhargav will also arrive to kill Rand as he is a ruthless officer but she has to clam to meet Bhargav as he could arrested alike he was arrested few years back.
title: Samudra
plot: A beautiful young woman refuses to carry forward her mother's tradition of being a drama organizer and fights against the system.

Vishnu Khot a village head has controlled the village for years for his benefits he has killed many people he daily goes to spend night with Nanda a courtesan along with his illegitimate son Raghu who waits to guard him.On his way to house of Nanda ,Vishnu always years screams of Raghu's mother but Raghu cant here the same and feels it to be the ghost of his mother whom Vishnu had killed.The village get a message that British Officer Rand will be arriving soon and they have to be ready fro the same to please him.Nanda finds that her lover Bhargav will also arrive to kill Rand as he is a ruthless officer but she has to clam to meet Bhargav as he could arrested alike he was arrested few years back.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
